name: Tokyo: Rebirth
description:
Welcome to Tokyo Rebirth!

You're stuck in a timeloop inside of a japanese temple - everytime you die, you start over from the same point! The only way to escape is to unlock all afterlife abilities which will be unlocked after your death and confront the timelord with the power of all of them!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to attack with Katana

Q to shoot Spells (1234 to select them)

E to interact with objects

Z to open the afterlife ability skilltree

I made this game in 3 days during a livestream, so there are still a few bugs in here and the game needs some more polishing, but if I receive enough feedback, I'll continue working on this ;D
